name: Floor is Lava Super Market Edition
name_original: Floor is Lava Super Market Edition
description:
- To not touch the lava whilst trying to get all of the items picked up in the supermarket

- Touching the lava will reset you to your spawn point.

-There are shelf's, mushrooms, toilet roll and boxes you can jump on throughout the game that can help you collect all the items to win without touching the lava.
